forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy during the morning with a few showers developing in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 30%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Windy this morning. High 59F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening then thundershowers developing overnight. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Locally heavier rainfall possible.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early then thundershowers overnight. Low 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Locally heavier rainfall possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with showers and thundershowers in the morning...overcast during the afternoon with occasional rain likely. High 12C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. High 53F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Thunderstorms possible...mainly late. Low 4C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and thunderstorms. Low near 40F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers likely. High 8C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers likely. High 47F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers during the evening will give way to steady rain overnight. Low near 5C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms during the evening giving way to periods of light rain overnight. Low 41F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 8C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 47F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Then becoming foggy. Low 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain giving way to foggy conditions overnight. Low 39F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 9C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 48F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 2C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 37F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 9C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 49F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 3C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 38F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 9C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 49F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 4C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 39F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 7C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High around 45F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 38F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 9C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 48F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 38F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 9C. SE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 48F. SE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 4C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 39F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
